email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to offer a freight rate for 12,000MT of wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai on CIF terms. The vessel we propose is the PACIFIC STAR, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 250m. The laycan is set for 20th to 25th October, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD45.50 per MT.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, we were hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD43.00 per MT?

Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage rate and any potential delays?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-standing relationship, we can offer a revised freight rate of USD44.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day, pro rata. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let us know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD44.00 per MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight Solutions

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Brisbane on 20th October, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Wheat from Brisbane to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
Sophia Martinez
Global Freight Solutions
